metadata.name: Sapphire
metadata.description:
This is a story of King Sapph who was the ruler of Ire kingdom. He was the only person of  Milkyway galaxy having Dark Serum flowing in his body instead of blood like a normal human being. 

From his childhood times, he was always attracted to dark magic and dark energy. He was using the nearest black hole for brewing the Dark Serum just to keep its heart pumping. But this process was taking 90% of his dark energy and as a result he was never able to perform any dark trick successfully. 

He always wanted to create his own Dark kingdom where sun never rise and citizens of his kingdom works for him to generate more and more Dark Serum. But he was not aware that his father was hiding a secret from him. Sapph killed him and he discovered there is Gigantic source of Dark Serum which is a crystal located in Ire kingdom. He combined both Sapph and Ire to name this crystal Sapphire and finally now he is going to become the creator of Dark Kingdom.
